parameters.text: "Game Dev Randolph: Welcome to Cthuluâ€™s Prison! Your goal is to destroy the montsers and escape."
"Game Dev Randolph:  You are in a small turret. Point and shoot. We want our game to be very hard to beat! Nintendo hard. So try your best! But whatever you do, DON'T CHEAT!"
"Game Dev Randolph:  WHAT?!?!? How in the world did you do that? That was incredible. Okay, I guess we need to crank up the difficulty. Good luck on this next round!"
"Game Dev Randolph: Hrmm. Interesting... I think it's time to throw even more your way! Get ready!"
